welcome.subtitle: The first social network that also combines a free dating site and rewards your creativity with cryptocurrency
welcome.features_1_2: Connect with people who share your interests. Create, share, and interact with posts, photos, and videos
welcome.features_2_2: Find new friends (or even love), discover people nearby or around the world, chat securely thanks to blockchain
welcome.features_3_2: Earn $FREISE, our dedicated cryptocurrency for all your transactions on the platform, by creating content, interacting with the community, participating in challenges, referring friends, etc.
